name: Indyeva Turvata Liner Jacket - Women's
description: Take on mixed-bag weather and transitional days in a stylish layer. The close fit slides easily under an overcoat or rain jacket. Shaped, curved seams and subtle details give the Turvata the unequalled polish of Indyeva winter pieces.Lightweight windproof fabric has a DWR finish.C6 short-chain fluocarbon finish that generates less impact on the environment compared to DWR long-chain finishes.80g PRIMALOFT® GOLD insulation is compressible and light.2-way YKK front zip.Shaped hem and cuffs.Handwarmer pockets with YKK zips.Subtle reflective details.Back length is 33.5 inches.
